keywords: Allow Projection To PC Over Infrastructure
description: This policy setting allows you to turn off projection to a PC over infrastructure.                             If you set it to 0, your PC cannot be discoverable and can't be projected to over infrastructure, though it may still be possible to project over WiFi Direct.                             If you set it to 1, your PC can be discoverable and can be projected to over infrastructure.
name: AllowProjectionToPCOverInfrastructure
displayName: Allow Projection To PC Over Infrastructure

options.description: Your PC is not discoverable and other devices cannot project to it over infrastructure, although it is possible to project to it over WiFi Direct.
options.name: Your PC is not discoverable and other devices cannot project to it over infrastructure, although it is possible to project to it over WiFi Direct.
options.displayName: Your PC is not discoverable and other devices cannot project to it over infrastructure, although it is possible to project to it over WiFi Direct.

options.description: Your PC is discoverable and other devices can project to it over infrastructure.
options.name: Your PC is discoverable and other devices can project to it over infrastructure.
options.displayName: Your PC is discoverable and other devices can project to it over infrastructure.
